components_slices_feature_columns.title: Preview your changes
components_slices_feature_columns.description: Thanks to an integrated Preview Mode, you can visualize your pages before publishing them.

components_slices_feature_columns.title: Fully responsive
components_slices_feature_columns.description: This starter works well on all screens, whether it's mobile, tablet or desktop.

components_slices_feature_columns.title: Easy to customize
components_slices_feature_columns.description: We use Tailwind for styling. You can change your site's theme without digging through the code.

components_slices_feature_columns.title: Visualisez vos changments
components_slices_feature_columns.description: Grace à un mode preview, vous pouvez voir vos pages avant de les publier.

components_slices_feature_columns.title: 100% responsive
components_slices_feature_columns.description: Ce starter marche sur toutes les tailles d'écrans.

components_slices_feature_columns.title: Facile à personnaliser
components_slices_feature_columns.description: On utilise Tailwind pour les styles. Vous pouvez changez le thème de votre site sans avoir besoin d'aller dans le code.
